subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Gaël Monfils of France defeated his compatriot Paul-Henri Mathieu, 7-6 (0), 6-4, to advance to the second round of the Mercedes Cup in Stuttgart, Germany.
snippet: Gaël Monfils of France defeated his compatriot Paul-Henri Mathieu, 7-6 (0), 6-4, to advance to the second round of the Mercedes Cup in Stuttgart, Germany.
